text1:
Cursory scans indicate this Station to be an abandoned Domain era research station, built either to study some interesting local phenomenon or to study that which is best kept far, far away from inhabited worlds. 

This illusion is shattered as your fleet moves into visual range. Though undeniably Domain in construction, two enormous modules slowly rotate about the Superstructure, populated by a vast network of gantries ending in what appears to be oversized clamps.
